title: "CEID COVID-19 - Case & Fatality Tracker"

<p id="disclaimer"></p>

<br><br><br>The COVID-19 Tracker provides up-to-date information on documented cases, hospitalizations, and fatalities. Information can be displayed geographically by country or U.S. state.

<div id="preloader"></div>

```{r echo=FALSE, out.extra='id="nCov-tracker" scrolling="no" width="100%"'}
knitr::include_url("https://shiny.ovpr.uga.edu/yactv2/")
```
